description: This file implements a module that provides functions to generate random IDs using a custom alphabet. It defines the alphabet, a function to create custom ID generators, and the main nanoid function to produce IDs of specified length. It exports these functions for external usage.

methods.name: customAlphabet
methods.description: Creates a custom ID generator function that produces IDs of a specified size using a provided alphabet.

methods.name: nanoid
methods.description: Generates a random ID string of a specified size using a predefined URL alphabet.
